title: How Stadia Pro Lets Subscribers Keep Games - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.19.19
description:
Quip starts at just $25 and if you go to http://GetQuip.com/GAMES right now, you can get your first refill pack for FREE.

Buy your Health + Ancestry Service kit today at http://23andme.com/GAMES

Fran and Andrea go deep on Google Stadia Pro's services, the best-selling games of June and argue about Nintendo Switch's new battery life.

Time Stamps - 
00:02:30 - Housekeeping
The LEGO Podcast studio needs your help! Kbabz made the KF set in LEGO, and if we get 10,000 votes, it might become a reality: kindafunny.com/lego
Greg’s getting his 100th Plat Monday, July 22 @ 4 pm on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames
The Roper Report   -
00:06:44 - Stadia Pro isn't Netflix for games, Google insists
00:21:53 - Super Mario Maker 2 Is June 2019's Best-Selling Game

00:39:38 - Out today
00:42:55 -  Quip
00:44:47 - 23 And Me
Reader mail   -
00:46:24 - “Is it safe to assume that Nintendo will lose this momentum when the PS5 and Xbox Two comes out?” - Borzen00
00:49:54 - “The Switch Lite is handheld only, how about Switch Pro, docked only?” - 2038 Pokemon CEO
00:52:43 - “Do you think we will see an increase in games being released in summer months in the future?” - Parker
00:56:30 - Squad Up: Brendan - PS4 - Brendanowits_627
Rabs - League of Legends - Twitter: @TheBlackRabby
00:57:56 - You‘re Wrong
